alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 21 at 1:09PM CST until January 22 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of two tenths to four tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of western and northwestern Arkansas. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Monday.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
